numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that less than half of the coaches are people of color.
2. I noticed that less than half of the managers are people of color.
3. I wonder why only 40% of the players in M.L.B. are people of color.
4. This situation has an impact on my community.
5. In my community, players will most likely be willing to play football professionally instead of baseball professionally.
6. In my community, players will most likely be willing to play basketball professionally instead of baseball professionally.
7. In my community, players will most likely be willing to play soccer professionally instead of baseball professionally.
